attributes.action: help stop probation office kitts green
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The probation service is intending to open new offices in a building on the corner of mackadown lane and the meadway in kitts green birmingham. We already suffer high levels of crime and we are in adjacent to three nursery infant and junior schools. We urge you to ask the probation services to seek a more appropriate location for this office. A petition of more than 7000 names collated in just 3 weeks and is continuing to gather at pace.I am setting this site up on behalf of the local community in kitts green and tile cross seeking your help.

rejection.details:
This petition overlaps with several already in existence -
http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/Mackadown/
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
